history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is your destination?For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER I'm going to Children's Hospital.
TTS Okay, going to upmc children's hospital of pittsburgh. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER I'm leaving from CMU.
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER I like to go at 10 p.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 10:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak>There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 43 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='1.5s'/>
Walk for about 3 mins to Forbes avenue Opposite Craig Street<break time='1.5s'/>
Take the 61D ,to Forbes avenue at Murray avenue. It will depart at 10:03pm.<break time='1.5s'/>
Walk for about 1 min to Murray avenue at Forbes avenue.<break time='1.5s'/>
Take the 64 ,to Penn avenue at 44th St . . It will depart at 10:25pm.<break time='1.5s'/>
Walk for about 2 mins to 4401 Penn avenue.<break time='1.5s'/>
<break time='800ms'/>If you would like to go by driving instead, please say start over, and then choose driving directions.<break time='1.5s'/>
TTS <speak>if you missed anything, please say repeat, else say continue</speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER No, thank you.
